Package org.neo4j.kernel.impl.storemigration

Class FulltextConfigExtractor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.neo4j.kernel.impl.storemigration.FulltextConfigExtractor
  • class FulltextConfigExtractor
extends Object
    This class is the amber in which 3.5 fulltext index config reading is preserved in. It has the ability to extract index configuration from a 3.5 fulltext index directory.
